Yay! Finally fixed the onnx test.

Now that the tests should pass. I can confidently ask for reviews.

@jekbradbury Does the new proposed interface look good to you? Specifically, it is nn.LayerNorm(normalized_shape), where normalized_shape is the shape of the last few dimensions to be normalized over. The shape info is needed to initialize the affine transform parameters which Layer Norm is usually used together with.
